articles.author: Kelsey Borresen
articles.content:

articles.description: "My husband lost his voice so I get to speak for him now and it’s amazing how many of our longest running arguments I’ve suddenly won."
articles.title: 20 Of The Funniest Tweets About Married Life (Nov. 7 - 13)
